I developed a specialized chipset that can enhance the ability of few machines' to interact with their environment.
It is especially useful in machines that kill creatures, since this chip enhances their reach.
A high quality tactical control chipset (high chip power), as well as mounting multiple chipsets, increases their effects accordingly.
Info: The actual effect of this chipset will be determined by the machine in which this chipset is installed.
Hint: Refer to "Logic Chipset" for general information on chipsets.
